tool_description: Analyzes recipient background and relationship context to recommend optimal communication strategies and approaches for professional emails.

recipient_title.description: Professional title or role of the recipient

relationship_history.description: Previous interaction history: first_contact, occasional, regular, close_working

communication_context.description: Current communication context: sales, support, collaboration, complaint, networking

cultural_considerations.description: Cultural or regional communication preferences if known

previous_response_pattern.description: Typical response behavior: quick, detailed, brief, formal

error_messages: Empty recipient name: Provide the recipient's name

usage: Provide recipient_name, relationship_history, and communication_context. Optionally add recipient_title, company_name, cultural_considerations, and previous_response_pattern for more tailored recommendations.

communication_strategy.description: Recommended overall approach for this recipient

key_considerations.description: Important factors to consider in communication
